Uses of Interface
org.js4ms.io.channel.MessageOutput

  • Packages that use MessageOutput 
    Package Description
    org.js4ms.io.channel  
    org.js4ms.io.net  

    • Uses of MessageOutput in org.js4ms.io.channel

      Subinterfaces of MessageOutput in org.js4ms.io.channel 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  DuplexChannel<MessageType>
      Interface exposed by all duplex message channel objects.
      interface  MessagePipe<MessageType>
      Interface exposed by objects that accept messages from a message sender source and make those messages available to a message receiver.
      interface  OutputChannel<MessageType>
      Interface exposed by all message output channels objects.
      Classes in org.js4ms.io.channel that implement MessageOutput 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MessageOutputMap<MessageType>
      An message channel that routes an incoming message to one in a set of message channels.
      class  MessageQueue<MessageType>
      A message pipe that buffers messages in a fixed-size, blocking queue.
      class  OutputChannelAdapter<OuterMessageType,InnerMessageType>
      Abstract base class for all message output channels that transform or filter messages before sending them to an inner message channel.
      class  OutputChannelFilter<MessageType>
      An output channel adapter that uses a filter to determine which messages sent to the adapter channel should be sent to the inner output channel.
      class  OutputChannelMap<MessageType>
      An output channel that forwards a message to one output channel out of a set of one or more output channels based on a key value extracted from the message.
      class  OutputChannelPipe<MessageType>
      A message output channel that sends messages to any object that implements the MessageOutput interface.
      class  OutputChannelTee<MessageType>
      An output channel that forwards messages to one or more attached output channels.
      class  OutputChannelTransform<OuterMessageType,InnerMessageType>
      An output channel adapter that transforms message objects sent to it into message objects of the same or different type that it then forwards to another OutputChannel.
      Methods in org.js4ms.io.channel that return MessageOutput 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MessageOutput<MessageType> MessageOutputMap.get(Object key)
      Returns the message channel, if any, added using the specified key.
      Methods in org.js4ms.io.channel with parameters of type MessageOutput 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void OutputChannelPipe.connect(MessageOutput<MessageType> pipe)
      Connects this output channel to the specified message pipe.
      void MessageOutputMap.put(Object key, MessageOutput<MessageType> channel)
      Adds or replaces a message channel in the map.
      void MessageOutputMap.remove(MessageOutput<MessageType> channel)
      Removes the specified message channel from the map.
      Constructors in org.js4ms.io.channel with parameters of type MessageOutput 
      Constructor and Description
      OutputChannelPipe(MessageOutput<MessageType> pipe)
      Constructs an output channel that is connected to the specified message pipe.

    • Uses of MessageOutput in org.js4ms.io.net

      Subinterfaces of MessageOutput in org.js4ms.io.net 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  UdpEndpoint
      A DuplexChannel used to send and receive UdpDatagram objects.
      Classes in org.js4ms.io.net that implement MessageOutput 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  UdpOutputChannel
      An OutputChannel that can be used to send UdpDatagram instances to a UdpEndpoint.
      class  UdpPacketOutputChannel
      An OutputChannel that can be used to send a byte array containing an RTP/RTCP packet to a specific address and port via UDP.
      class  UdpSocketEndpoint
      A UdpEndpoint implementation that uses a DatagramChannel to provide transport.
